Childlike.text: Hee-ho! You wanna be my friend?

answers.text: Of course! Let's be best friends.
I don't have time for games.
Only if you're strong enough.

Childlike.text: If I join you, will you give me lots of candy?

answers.text: All the candy you can eat.
Candy is bad for your teeth.
You'll have to earn it.

Arrogant.text: Hmph. Do you truly believe you are worthy of my power?

answers.text: Your power is magnificent. I am not worthy, but I ask for it anyway.
My power is far greater than yours.
Let's find out together.

Arrogant.text: The weak exist only to serve the strong. Do you not agree?

answers.text: That is the law of the universe.
The strong should protect the weak.

Timid.text: U-umm... you won't... hurt me, will you?

answers.text: I promise I'll keep you safe.
Only if you step out of line.
The world is a dangerous place.

Timid.text: It's so scary out here... I don't know what to do...

answers.text: Stay with me. We can be brave together.
Then you should just run away.

Sultry.text: Well now... aren't you a handsome devil? What is it you want from me?

answers.text: I'm captivated by you. I want your power.
Just another demon in my way.
I'm looking for allies.

Sultry.text: Don't you think this fighting is so... pointless? There are better ways to spend our time.

answers.text: Perhaps you could show me?
This is a matter of life and death.

Honorable.text: State your purpose. Why do you seek my strength?

answers.text: I seek justice, and your strength is righteous.
For my own personal gain.
To survive this cursed world.

Honorable.text: Would you sacrifice one of your own comrades to achieve your goal?

answers.text: Never. My bonds are my strength.
The mission comes first. Sacrifices are necessary.

Gloomy.text: It's all so meaningless... Why do you even bother fighting?

answers.text: Because even in darkness, there's a reason to hope.
You're right. It's pointless.
To find my own meaning.

Gloomy.text: We're all just going to die anyway. Join me... and we can fade into nothingness together.

answers.text: I'm not ready to give up yet.
Fine by me.

Upbeat.text: Hey! Hey! You look like you're going somewhere fun! Can I come?

answers.text: The more the merrier! Let's go!
This is a serious journey, not a party.

Upbeat.text: Wow, you're super strong! We'd be an unstoppable team, don't you think?

answers.text: Totally! Together, we can take on the world!
Don't get ahead of yourself.
I suppose your power could be useful.

Formal.text: It is my assessment that an alliance would be mutually beneficial. Do you concur?

answers.text: I concur. Let us form a pact.
I don't make deals with demons.

Formal.text: Please state the terms of our potential contract. What is it that you offer in exchange for my services?

answers.text: A chance to witness a new world's creation.
Macca. Lots of it.
Your life. Join me or perish.

Childlike: Hey, I know you! My brother says hi!
Hee-ho! Another one of us! Fun!
Arrogant: Hmph. So you run with my kind. I suppose you have some taste.
Another of my clan follows you. You must have some merit.
Timid: O-oh... you already have a friend like me... That's nice.
You seem kind... just like my sibling...
Sultry: Well now... you certainly have a type, don't you, darling?
I see you already have company. Pity.
Honorable: I see the banner of my clan is already with you. A wise choice.
You keep good company. I will not interfere.
Gloomy: Another soul bound to your fate... How tragic.
It doesn't matter... We all end up in the same place.
Upbeat: Whoa! You know my pal! Awesome!
Hey, tell my buddy I said what's up!
Formal: It appears you already have a contract with one of my kind. I will not infringe.
A prior agreement is in place. I shall take my leave.
